nodes.text: A battleship was a large, armored, and heavily armed type of capital ship that not only was armed for fighting, but was also typically designed to transport ground troops, launch squadrons of starfighters, and serve as mobile hospitals. Battleships were designed to be part of force projection, fleet actions, and for bombarding planets.
The Lucrehulk-class Battleship was a modified version of the Lucrehulk-class LH-3210 cargo freighter used by the Confederacy of Independent Systems.

The Starhawk-class battleship was a type of warship created by Nadiri Dockyards using parts from Imperial-class Star Destroyers for the New Republic. There were two variants, the Starhawk-class Battleship Mark I and the Starhawk-class Battleship Mark II.
